sentences.english: Available in selected TV programs in TVB Jade Channel.
sentences.chinese: 於指定的無線電視翡翠臺節目提供。

sentences.english: Hong Kong TVB actress Yung Mei Ling was discovered dead at her home yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 香港無線電視演員容美玲被發現死在家裏昨天。

sentences.english: Low-voltage dual frequency synthesizer for radio telephones.
sentences.chinese: 低電壓無線電話雙頻率合成器。

sentences.english: Honeycomb radio communication network, method, protocol and computer program.
sentences.chinese: 蜂窩式無線電通信網，方法，協議和計算機程序。

sentences.english: Relevant suggestions on reducing radio interference caused by converter station are given.
sentences.chinese: 文章還給出了減少換流站無線電干擾的相關建議。

sentences.english: An urgent message was radioed to us this morning.
sentences.chinese: 今天早上有條緊急消息以無線電報發給我們。

sentences.english: With the radio on, grandma slept deeply in the chair .
sentences.chinese: 無線電收音機開者，祖母在椅子裏沉沉的入睡。

sentences.english: The laboratory has two matrices capable of testing 40 radios.
sentences.chinese: 該實驗室有兩個矩陣，可測試40個無線電。

sentences.english: I used this set to transmit a message to the brigade HQ that Paulus had been captured.
sentences.chinese: 我用無線電向旅部報告，保盧斯已經被俘。

sentences.english: After succeeding in landing on George Island, the captain sent a radio message to his headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 勝利登上喬治島後，船長向指揮部發了一份無線電報。

sentences.english: This high frequency alternating current produces the high frequency radio waves mentioned in the previous chapter.
sentences.chinese: 這種高頻交流電流產生前一章提到過的高頻無線電波。

sentences.english: JTRS is the next generation of radios for the U.
sentences.chinese: JTRS是美國軍隊的下一代無線電。

sentences.english: Wireless phones are, by far, more common than landlines.
sentences.chinese: 到目前爲止無線電話用戶比固話用戶更多。

sentences.english: Safety radio telegraphy certificate One (1) copy.
sentences.chinese: 安全無線電通訊證書1份。

sentences.english: Tom's father works in the radio factory.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆的父親在無線電廠工作。

sentences.english: Cellphones use ultra-high-frequency radio waves to connect with telecommunications networks.
sentences.chinese: 手機利用超高頻無線電波與通訊網絡取得聯繫。
